disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Living Vengeance.

blurb.value: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Speed. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.

description.value: Innate: Varus gains 40% (+ 30% bonus attack speed)  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds upon an enemy champion takedown, and 20% (+ 15% bonus attack speed) bonus attack speed on non-champion kills.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Piercing Arrow.

blurb.value: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.

description.value: Active: Varus charges for up to 4 seconds to gradually increase Piercing Arrow's  range and damage while being slowed by 20%. Piercing Arrow can be recast at any time within its duration.

description2.value: If the charge completes without reactivation, Piercing Arrow is canceled, refunding 50% of its  mana cost.

description3.value: Recast: Varus fires a piercing arrow in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies struck, which is increased by 0% − 50% (based on channel time). The arrow's damage is reduced to 100% − 33% (based on enemies hit).

description4.value: Detonating Blight stacks on an enemy champion reduces Piercing Arrow's  cooldown by 3 seconds.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The range of the spell will always be displayed, even as it increases. Piercing Arrow will cast from wherever Varus is at the end of the channel. The following table refers for interactions while Varus is channeling: Type Charge channel Attacking Disabled Abilities Blighted Quiver is usable during the first 0.25 seconds, otherwise, it's disabled. Hail of Arrows and Chain of Corruption are disabled. This ability recasts to end channel. Movement Allowed Items Usable N/A Disabled All items are disabled Interrupted by N/A Consumables Disabled, but can still use trinkets. Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Flash Disabled Teleport Recall Interrupted by Hexflash (Recasts) Interrupted by Death Silencing effects

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Blighted Quiver.

blurb.value: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health.

description.value: Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

description2.value: Varus' other abilities detonate Blight on enemies upon damaging them, dealing magic damage for each stack. This damage is capped at 360 against monsters.

leveling2.value: Magic Damage per Stack:»3 / 3.5 / 4 / 4.5 / 5% (+ 2% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health«Maximum Magic Damage:9 / 10.5 / 12 / 13.5 / 15% (+ 6% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health

description3.value: Active: Varus' next Piercing Arrow deals 6% − 14% (based on level) of the target's missing health bonus magic damage, increased by 0% − 50% (based on Piercing Arrow channel time), for a maximum of 9% − 21% (based on level) of the target's missing health. This damage is capped at 360 against monsters. If Varus is not charging Piercing Arrow, Blighted Quiver may be recast after 1 second and will go on a 1 second cooldown if it isn't used within 5.5 seconds of its activation or immediately if Varus dies.

description4.value: Blighted Quiver can be cast during the first 0.25 seconds of Piercing Arrow's charge. Blighted Quiver is placed on full cooldown even if the duration ends and the arrow is not fired or if the charge is interrupted.

description5.value: Recast: Varus cancels Blighted Quiver and puts it on a 1 second  cooldown.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Spell shield will not block the on-hit damage but will block the consuming damage if the target is hit by his abilities. Blighted Quiver's active damage is dealt after the damage of Piercing Arrow. Using the Active of Blighted Quiver does not count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade or charging Spellbinder. PENDING FOR TEST: Blighted Quiver's on-hit interaction with parrying effects ( dodge, block, blind).
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Hail of Arrows.

blurb.value: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Movement Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.

description.value: Active: Varus fires a hail of arrows at the target location, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit on impact.

description2.value: The area is desecrated for 4 seconds, slowing all enemies within and applying Grievous Wounds.

description3.value: Hail of Arrows will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Slow lingers for 0.25 seconds after leaving the marked area.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Chain of Corruption.

blurb.value: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.

description.value: Active: Varus flings out a tendril of corruption in the target direction that infects the first enemy champion hit, dealing magic damage and revealing and rooting them for 2 seconds while inflicting them with full stacks of Blight over 1.5 seconds.

description2.value: On impact, the tendril seeks out nearby enemy champions for 2 seconds, after which they are also infected. Tendrils will continue to spread until there are no champions in range that have not already been affected.

description3.value: Chain of Corruption will attempt to spread even if the first target dies or becomes free of the root.

description4.value: The tendril seeks targets regardless of having sight of them or not.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Enemy champions can be targeted again by the corruption's tether if they were not infected the previous time, even if they were targeted and got out of range. Chain of Corruption will not infect cc-immune targets or those protected by spell shields (but will still seek them). The tendril cannot seek enemy champions that are untargetable. Chain of Corruption will cast from wherever Varus is at the end of the cast time. Consuming the Blight's stacks applied by Chain of Corruption will deal bonus magic damage based on Blighted Quiver's rank. If the ability hasn't been ranked yet, the three Blight stacks will still be applied but they will be considered to be at rank 0, dealing 1.25% (+ 2% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health per stack.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.
